Hi there, I'm Gu Zhenhao!

I am a student and Teaching Assistant at School of Computing, National University of Singapore. My current research interest lies in Algorithms & Theory and Computational Biology.

I believe Bioinformatics is the perfect testing ground for theoretical Computer Science. Feel free to check out my works, and discuss with me!
